name: rag-agent-proxy
description: Прокси-сервер для добавления параметра provider в запросы Roo Code Nightly

scripts.clean: fuser -k 3000/tcp 3005/tcp 8081/tcp 8082/tcp 2>/dev/null || true && rm -rf admin/.next admin/node_modules/.cache || true
scripts.dev:emulator: pnpm run clean && concurrently "pnpm run server" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run admin" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run frontend" "wait-on tcp:8082 && pnpm run android" --names "SERVER,ADMIN,METRO,ANDROID" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,magenta,green"
scripts.dev:usb: pnpm run clean && ./adb-reverse-all.sh && concurrently "pnpm run server" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run admin" "wait-on tcp:8081 && pnpm run frontend" "wait-on tcp:8082 && pnpm run device" --names "SERVER,ADMIN,METRO,ANDROID" --prefix-colors "blue,yellow,magenta,green"
